The table is determined by the parameter content. public

Product.ActualOrderCatalog ( $  dept_nr,
$  type = '' 
)

Returns the actual order catalog of a department.

The returned adodb record object contains rows of arrays. Each array contains catalog data with index keys as outlined in the $fld_ocat array. public

Parameters:
int Department number
string Determines the final table name
